REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f1117 reute b f BC-DENMARK-ISSUES-200-ML 03-20 0075

TEXT.TITLE: DENMARK ISSUES 200 MLN ECU EUROBOND DUE 1992
TEXT.BODY: Denmark is issuing a 200 mln ECU eurobond due April 23, 1992 paying 7-1/4 pct and priced at 101-3/8 pct, lead manager Morgan Stanley International said. The bond is available in denominations of 1,000, 10,000 and 250,000 ECU and will be listed in Luxembourg. Fees comprise 1-1/4 pct selling concession and 5/8 pct management and underwriting. Payment date is April 23. REUTER
